title: Prescription

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give someone a prescription of drugs each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is attacked the night after you target them, they will gain Unstoppable defense for that night.
- If you visit the same target twice in a row, they will be dealt an Overkill attack.
- If your target is dealt a delayed attack the night after you target them, the delayed attack will instead take effect immediately.
- You may choose a secondary effect for your drugs:
> - Requires 75% of the total players to hang the next day
> - Roleblocked the next night
> - Vote secretly counts triple the next day
> - If they are not attacked, they gain Vulnerable defense instead.
> - Roleblock and prevention immunity the next night.
> - Rampages. (1 use)
